com.ihealth.communication.control

Class HS6Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.HS6Control

  • public class HS6Control
extends java.lang.Object
    Public API for HS6.

    Before using these methods,you need to call iHealthDevicesManager.sdkUserInAuthor(Context, String, String, String, int) for permission.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean bindDeviceHS6(java.lang.String birthday, float weight, int height, int isSporter, int gender, java.lang.String serialNumber)
      Bind the user and scale together,after bind success user's weight datas can be transmitted to the cloud .And this method is a time consuming operation that cannot be called in the main thread.
      boolean getToken(java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String clientSecret, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String clientPara)
      Get AccessToken of HS6 user,and this method is a time consuming operation that cannot be called in the main thread.
      boolean setUnit(java.lang.String username, int unitType)
      set unit of HS6,and this method is a time consuming operation that cannot be called in the main thread.
      boolean setWifi(java.lang.String ssid, java.lang.String password)
      Set wifi to the scale.
      boolean setWifi(java.lang.String ssid, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String deviceKey)
      Set wifi to the scale use sniffer.
      boolean unBindDeviceHS6(java.lang.String serialNumber)
      unBind the user and scale,and this method is a time consuming operation that cannot be called in the main thread.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HS6Control

        public HS6Control(java.lang.String userName,
                  android.content.Context context,
                  java.lang.String type,
                  iHealthDeviceHs6Callback hs6Callback)
        A construct of HS6Control
        Parameters:
        userName - the unique ID for user
        context - Context
        type - the type of iHealth devices
        hs6Callback - all the information or data of these methods are returnned by iHealthDeviceHs6Callback

    • Method Detail

      • setWifi

        public boolean setWifi(java.lang.String ssid,
                       java.lang.String password)
        Set wifi to the scale.
        Parameters:
        ssid - the name of net
        password - the password of the net
        Returns:
        boolean whether has permission of using the method,false you need to get the permission firstly.The result of set wifi is returnned by iHealthDeviceHs6Callback.setWifiNotify(String, String, String) its' action is ACTION_HS6_SETWIFI.

      • setWifi

        public boolean setWifi(java.lang.String ssid,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String deviceKey)
        Set wifi to the scale use sniffer.
        Parameters:
        ssid - the name of net.Default value is current wifi ssid.
        password - the password of the net.not null.
        deviceKey - the deviceKey of the device.Default value is "device_key".
        Returns:
        boolean whether has permission of using the method,false you need to get the permission firstly.The result of set wifi is returnned by iHealthDeviceHs6Callback.setWifiNotify(String, String, String) its' action is ACTION_HS6_SETWIFI.

      • bindDeviceHS6

        public boolean bindDeviceHS6(java.lang.String birthday,
                             float weight,
                             int height,
                             int isSporter,
                             int gender,
                             java.lang.String serialNumber)
        Bind the user and scale together,after bind success user's weight datas can be transmitted to the cloud .And this method is a time consuming operation that cannot be called in the main thread.
        Parameters:
        birthday - format like yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss
        height - the unit is cm
        weight - the unit is kg
        isSporter - is sporter; 2 is not ;3 unknown
        gender - 0 is male ;1 is female
        serialNumber - the mac address of the scale
        Returns:
        boolean whether has permission of using the method,false you need to get the permission firstly.The result of binding user is returnned by iHealthDeviceHs6Callback.onNotify(String, String, String, String) and its' action is ACTION_HS6_BIND

      • unBindDeviceHS6

        public boolean unBindDeviceHS6(java.lang.String serialNumber)
        unBind the user and scale,and this method is a time consuming operation that cannot be called in the main thread.
        Parameters:
        serialNumber - the mac address of scale
        Returns:
        boolean whether has permission of using the method,false you need to get the permission firstly.The result of unbinding user is returnned by iHealthDeviceHs6Callback.onNotify(String, String, String, String) and its' action is ACTION_HS6_UNBIND

      • getToken

        public boolean getToken(java.lang.String clientId,
                        java.lang.String clientSecret,
                        java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String clientPara)
        Get AccessToken of HS6 user,and this method is a time consuming operation that cannot be called in the main thread. After get AccessToken, you can call openApi(http://developer.ihealthlabs.com) to pull data form iHealth cloud.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the identification of the SDK
        clientSecret - the identification of the SDK
        username - the identification of the user
        clientPara - a random string,return back without change
        Returns:
        boolean whether has permission of using the method,false you need to get the permission firstly.

        The result of get token is return by iHealthDeviceHs6Callback.onNotify(String, String, String, String) and its' action is ACTION_HS6_GET_TOKEN.

        eg.

        {"APIName":"OpenApiActivity OpenApiBG OpenApiBP OpenApiFood OpenApiSleep OpenApiSpO2 OpenApiSport OpenApiUserInfo OpenApiWeight",

        "AccessToken":"9fuIPl3Bo6lqJfbYjXFjuPnNwNqVfxjiUE7cMCZSjrX22RJSoKf28jtIhI0v86wjV5GJ21bc6LvMNbfYG0QsZ7cYuUSO0EkaiFTST*GcjZvvTKxfEOmhQTfLXTXYAOAwCoXlEs0DRqJaHZU5JS30ssyLNlqADPV9dlvWZitQmIfXjF6CSZM2SuRCD*bbbrqtwBsn*sC24OEoQCRpDau6wQ",

        "Expires":3672000,

        "RefreshToken":"9fuIPl3Bo6lqJfbYjXFjuPnNwNqVfxjiUE7cMCZSjrX22RJSoKf28jtIhI0v86wjV5GJ21bc6LvMNbfYG0QsZ2TcvTQNInn85XdPIJRIe-9zB-eaY5utBVKmtLjJdEEmBlx5le5mT6oF7WBwVkwx*CUpSsdgUcyE3mG3FJnSHlajogaUSUgvMgmgUaVEMYzv4pcbCUltGNAMqJt5wwvBZA",

        "RefreshTokenExpires":31536000,

        "UUID":"c27fcbca44314786a49c0b092fef3cd2 ",

        "UserID":"51027f3e09a14a55917e687c628a0f13",

        "UserRegion":"https:\/\/api.ihealthlabs.com.cn:8443",

        "client_para":"random_str"}

      • setUnit

        public boolean setUnit(java.lang.String username,
                       int unitType)
        set unit of HS6,and this method is a time consuming operation that cannot be called in the main thread.
        Parameters:
        username - the identification of the user
        unitType - the unit type

        0 Kg

        1 lbs

        2 st

        Returns:
        boolean whether has permission of using the method,false you need to get the permission firstly.The result of get token is returnned by iHealthDeviceHs6Callback.onNotify(String, String, String, String) and its' action is ACTION_HS6_SET_UNIT
